name: Flyers
overview: Another great party game from Czech provenience. Huge dogfight fun for four. A game based on The Dogfight Simulator game. It was created by Michal Franc, the graphics were provided by Michal Vrzáček and Jan Šulček. There is a humorous but short intro to the game. Up to four players can play. You can also use three different scenes, such as day, night and aurora borealis.
